Cards can be used to showcase various types of information, such as images, text, buttons, and more. This documentation will guide you through the usage and customization of Bootstrap 5.3 Card Components. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to help developers understand and utilize the Bootstrap 5.3 Card Components effectively. It covers the basic usage, customization options, and best practices for creating visually appealing and responsive cards. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To use Bootstrap 5.3 Card Components, you need to have the following pre-requisites: - Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS - Bootstrap 5.3 library included in your project - Text editor or integrated development environment (IDE) for code editing ### Step-by-Step Instructions 1. By following the step-by-step instructions and utilizing the provided code snippets, you can create visually appealing and responsive cards.
